verbs.description: [ARG1: Former White House Press Secretary Sean Spicer] [V: was] [ARG2: on hand] [ARGM-LOC: at Madame Tussauds in New York] [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday] [ARGM-PRP: to help unveil the museum 's newest addition — a wax figure of first lady Melania Trump] .

[ARG0: Former White House Press Secretary Sean Spicer] was on hand at Madame Tussauds in New York on Wednesday to [V: help] [ARG1: unveil the museum 's newest addition — a wax figure of first lady Melania Trump] .
